title: Enhance SD-WAN/LAN/WIFI Product & Production Model for MIST Q3
description:
Description
For whom Telekom
who Needs a product- and production model
provides the data model in CPDM with
a product and production model

Business Scope:
A ´product- (catalog and price model) and production model is requested for different IT systems in DT. A Model for Juniper SD-WAN already exists and must be enhanced with LAN/WiFi. The PO/PS level will be provided by Offering Management (BO). Basis for the production model shall be the module catalogue of the existing TDG product “mLan”.

Process and Dataflow Model, update PRIMA+
acceptance_criteria: Product and production model is aligned
Process and Dataflow Model is done and documented
update PRIMA+ is done and documented
